mapper.insert: insert into t_standard_category (oid, category_name, category_score, create_user, create_time) values (#{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_standard_category
oid,
category_name,
category_score,
create_user,
create_time,
#{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_standard_category
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_score = #{categoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(tsc.oid) from t_standard_category as tsc where 1=1
AND tsc.category_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%')

select tsc.* from t_standard_category as tsc where 1=1
AND tsc.category_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%')
order by tsc.create_time desc
limit #{start},#{length}
